    • Method Detail

      • getMonthList

        public static List<Month> getMonthList(Year year,
                                       YearMonth minYearMonth,
                                       YearMonth maxYearMonth)
        Gets the Months of a specified Year. An optional min YearMonth and max YearMonth will truncate the list of Month. E.g.:
        • year=2013, min = null, max=null: [JANUARY - DECEMBER]
        • year=2013, min = 2012-10, max=2014-02: [JANUARY - DECEMBER]
        • year=2013, min = 2013-02, max=2013-10: [FEBRUARY - OCTOBER]
        • year=2014, min = 2013-02, max=2013-10: []
        Parameters:
        year - the Year
        minYearMonth - the min YearMonth or null
        maxYearMonth - the max YearMonth or null
        Returns:
        the Months of a specified Year
